trans-unit.source: A task that represents the asynchronous commit operation.
trans-unit.target: A task that represents the asynchronous commit operation.

trans-unit.source: The result indicates a sequence number associated with the commit operation.
trans-unit.target: The result indicates a sequence number associated with the commit operation.

trans-unit.source: The transaction has already been committed or aborted.
trans-unit.target: The transaction has already been committed or aborted.

trans-unit.source: The transaction includes updates to state and the replica role is not Primary.
trans-unit.target: The transaction includes updates to state and the replica role is not Primary.

trans-unit.source: Only Primary replicas are given write status.
trans-unit.target: Only Primary replicas are given write status.

trans-unit.source: You cannot abort a transaction once it has been committed, because all modifications have been persisted and replicated.
trans-unit.target: You cannot abort a transaction once it has been committed, because all modifications have been persisted and replicated.
